de.griefed.monitoring.controllers

Class InformationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.monitoring.controllers.InformationController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="{*}")
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/v1")
public class InformationController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController providing endpoints for retrieving information about the host and configured hosts, if any.

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getHostsInformation()
      GET endpoint for retrieving information about all configured hosts.
      de.griefed.monitoring.host must be set to false in order for this endpoint to return information, otherwise a 400-error is returned.

    • Method Detail

      • getPolling

        @CrossOrigin(origins="{*}")
 @RequestMapping(value="polling",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getPolling()
        GET endpoint for retrieving the polling rate of this instance. Returns, as JSON, the polling rate currently set.
        Returns:
        String. de.griefed.monitoring.polling wrapped in a ResponseEntity as application/json.

      • getHostsInformation

        @CrossOrigin(origins="{*}")
 @RequestMapping(value="hosts",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getHostsInformation()
        GET endpoint for retrieving information about all configured hosts.
        de.griefed.monitoring.host must be set to false in order for this endpoint to return information, otherwise a 400-error is returned.
        Returns:
        String in JSON format. Information about all configured hosts. Wrapped in a ResponseEntity as application/json.
